decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p>Structural engineers report
</p><p>Before the start of the relevant part of the works, proposals for any structural works shall be submitted to and approved in
writing by the Local Planning Authority and shall be carried out accordingly.&nbsp; The required detail is the submission of a report
and method statement by a suitably qualified and experienced chartered structural engineer, addressing the following areas:
</p><p>a. Detailing the method by which the existing structure is to be supported and protected during the works so as to
ensure the structural stability and integrity of all the elements which are to be retained (the temporary works);
</p><p>b. Confirming how damage to the building or surrounding buildings and structures will be avoided and how the safety
and stability of the historic building fabric will be ensured;
</p><p>c. Detailing the structural interventions to ensure that the building will stand in the future, including details (for
example and not limited to) of any new foundation design, underpinning, steelwork and other strengthening and
their locations and methods of fixing and installation, with sketches as necessary (the permanent works).
</p><p>All excavation and structural works shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved and not
otherwise. All excavation and structural works shall be carried out by hand. No other excavation or structural works are
authorised by this consent without prior approval of the details.
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the
building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National
Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage
conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated
Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.<br></p>

<p>Design details including elevations and sections to be approved</p><p>
The following elements of the scheme shall not be installed, implemented or carried out unless in accordance with details
which shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; The details of the above shall include the following:
</p><p>a. Detail of proposed staircase in section and elevation showing treads, risers and balustrade.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out unless in accordance with the details so approved.
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the
building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National
Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage
conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated
Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.<br></p>

<p>Disturbed surfaces to be made good to match</p><p>
All disturbed surfaces shall be made good using materials to match the existing materials, composition, form, finish and
colour of the existing building.
</p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the
building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National
Planning Policy Framework, December 2023, Paragraphs 195 to 214; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage
conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated
Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.<br></p>
description: Installation of internal staircase between ground floor and basement level
